item.title: Transmission 15
item.description:
This Month Features:
"Half The Devil" (Alias)... "Whimsical" (Offwhyte)... "Selling Live Water" (Sole)... "Chainsaw Breakfast" (Sixtoo)... "Refreshing Beverage" (Odd Nosdam)... "Chicago Under A Full Moon feat. Offwhyte" (Mestizo)... "Ice" (Buck 65)... "Narcissist [ice mix]" (Sage Francis)... "Unemployed Black Astronaut [nobody remix]" (Busdriver)...
:: www.myspace.com/highbiashiphop :: :: www.highbiasentertainment.com ::
item.author: info@highbiasentertainment.com
